ARABIC: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Musa, I am Allah, the Almighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O Moses, I am that God, the mighty and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O Moses, verily this is Me, Allah, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses, I am God, the Majestic and All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “O Moosa, I am indeed, in truth, Allah the Almighty, the Wise.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O Musa! Verily, it is I, Allah, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O Musa! surely I am Allah, the Mighty, the Wise;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Moses, behold, it is I, God, the All-mighty, the All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O Moses! Lo! it is I, Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: O Moses, I am God, the Powerful, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Musa! verily it is I, Allah, the Mighty the Wise!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘O Moses! Indeed I am Allah, the All-mighty, the All-wise.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O Moses! verily, I am Allah, the exalted in might, the wise!....
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O Musa (Moses)! Verily! It is I, Allah, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Moses, it is I, Allah, the Almighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O Moses, it is I, God, the Almighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O Moses, indeed it is I - Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:9] O Moses, lo!, in other words, the fact is that, it is I, God, the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 Moses! Lo! it is I) Who is calling you, (Allah, the Mighty) in retribution against those who do not believe in Me, (the Wise) in My command and judgement, I command that none should be worshipped besides Me.
